src: "Hozir bizda diabetik bo'lishi kerak bo'lgan, diabetik bo'lmagan 4 oylik sichqon mavjud", deb qo'shib qo'ydi u.
mt: "We now have a four-month-old mouse that is diabetic and a four-month-old mouse that is not diabetic," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Yangi Shotlandiyaning Galifaks shahridagi Dalxauzi universiteti tibbiyot professori hamda Kanada diabet birlashmasining klinik va ilmiy bo'limi raisi doktor Ehud Ur tadqiqot hali o'zining boshlang'ich davrida ekani haqida ogohlantirdi.
mt: New Zealand's Dalhousie University medical professor and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's clinical and scientific division Dr. Ehud Ur says the study is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Ayrim boshqa mutaxassislar kabi, u diabetni davolash mumkinligiga shubha bilan qaraydi hamda mazkur xulosalar allaqachon 1-toifa diabetga chalingan kishilarga aloqador emasligini qayd etadi.
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical of the findings and notes that they are not relevant to people with type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Dushanba kuni Shvetsiya Fanlar akademiyasi adabiyot bo'yicha Nobel mukofoti qo'mitasining doimiy kotibasi Sara Danius Shetsiyaning Sveriges radiosidagi dastur davomida qo'mitaning adabiyot bo'yicha 2016-yili Nobel mukofotini yutganlik to'g'risida to'g'ridan-to'g'ri Bob Dilan bilan bog'lana olmagandan keyin u bilan bog'lanish bo'yicha urinishlarini to'xtatganligini ommaviy tarzda e'lon qildi.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, announced on the Swedish Radio program that she had been unable to contact Bob Dylan directly after the committee awarded him the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius "Biz hozirda hech nima qilmayapmiz. Men uning yaqin hamkoriga qo'ng'iroq qildim hamda elektron xatlar yubordim va do'stona javoblar oldim. Hozircha, shuning o'zi yetarli", dedi.
mt: "We're not doing anything right now. I called his close friend and sent him an email and got a friendly response. That's enough for now," he said.
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Oldin Ring kompaniyasining bosh direktori Jeymi Siminoff kompaniya o'z garajidagi ustaxonadan eshik qo'ng'irog'i eshitilmaganidan keyin boshlanganini qayd etgandi.
mt: Previously, Ring company CEO Jamie Siminoff had noted that the company had begun after hearing a knock on the door of their garage workshop.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: U WiFi eshik qo'ng'irog'ini yasadi, dedi u.
mt: He made a WiFi doorbell, he said he.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoffning aytishicha, shou komissiyasi startapni moliyalashtirishni rad etganidan keyin 2013-yili "Shark Tank" epizodidagi ko'rinishidan so'ng savdo hajmi oshib ketgan.
mt: 2013, after the show's commission rejected funding the start-up, Siminoff said sales skyrocketed after appearing on "Shark Tank."
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017-yilning oxirida Siminoff QVC xaridlar telekanalida ko'rinish berdi.
mt: 2017 saw Siminoff appear on QVC shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring xavfsizlik bo'yicha raqobatchi kompaniyasi – ADT korporatsiyasi bilan ham nizoni hal qildi.
mt: ADT Corporation, a rival in home security, also settled its lawsuit.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Birgina tajriba vaksinasi Eboladan o'lish xavfini kamaytira olishga qodir ko'rinsa ham, shu vaqtga qadar mavjud infeksiyani davolash uchun mos keladigan aniq birorta dori vositasi ko'rsatilmagan.
mt: While a single experimental vaccine has shown promise in reducing the risk of death from Ebola, no specific drug has yet been shown to cure the infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Antitanacha kokteyl ZMapp preparati dastlab bu sohada samaradorlik va'da qilgandi, biroq rasmiy tadqiqotlar uning o'limning oldini olish bo'yicha izlanishlarga qaraganda kamroq foyda keltirishini ko'rsatdi.
mt: Antiviral cocktail ZMapp was initially promising in this field, but official research showed it brought less benefit than research into preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM sinovida ZMapp nazorat sifatida xizmat qildi, bu olimlarning undan asos sifatida foydalangani va u bilan boshqa uchta davolash usulini taqqoslaganini anglatadi.
mt: ZMapp was used as a control in the PALM trial, which suggests that scientists used it as a basis for other three treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: AQSH Gimnastika qo'mitasi Qo'shma Shtatlar Olimpiya Qo'mitasining maktubini qo'llab-quvvatlaydi hamda bizning hamma atletlarimiz uchun xavfsiz muhitni ta'minlash maqsadida Olimpiya oilasining mutlaq ehtiyojlarini qabul qiladi.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee to the IOC and the need to ensure a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Biz USOCning sportchilarimiz va klublarimiz hamda ularning sporti manfaatlarini sertifikatdan mahrum qilishdan koʻra, tashkilotimiz ichida jiddiy oʻzgarishlar qilish orqali olgʻa siljish yaxshiroq taʼminlashi mumkin, degan fikriga qoʻshilamiz.
mt: We would rather see our athletes and clubs and their sport interests better served through significant changes within our organization than see them stripped of their certification by USOC.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: AQSH gimnastika federatsiyasi Larri Nassar qurbonlari tomonidan shu qadar jasurlarcha tasvirlangan darajadagi jinoyat qanday qilib shuncha payt aniqlanmay davom etganiga oydinlik kiritadigan mustaqil tekshiruvni qo'llab-quvvatlaydi hamda har qanday zaruriy va tegishli o'zgarishlarni qabul qiladi.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Federation supports an independent investigation into how the Larry Nassar abuse was allowed to go on for so long and will accept any necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: AQSH Gimnastika va USOC bir maqsadga ega — gimnastika va sport turini hamda boshqalarni atletlarning o'z orzulariga xavfsiz, ijobiy hamda vakolatli muhitda erishishlari uchun imkon qadar xavfsiz qilish.
mt: The United States Gymnastics and USOC share a common goal — to ensure that gymnastics and other sports are safe, positive and empowering environments for athletes to achieve their dreams.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960-yillar mobaynida Bjezinski Jon F. Kennedining maslahatchisi sifatida, so'ng Lindon B. Jonson ma'muriyatida faoliyat yuritdi.
mt: 1960s, served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976-yilgi saylovlar vaqtida u Karterga tashqi siyosat borasida maslahat bergan, so'ng Genri Kissingerdan keyin 1977-yildan 1981-yilgacha Milliy xavfsizlik maslahatchisi (NSA) sifatida xizmat qilgan.
mt: 1976 election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSA xodimi sifatida u Karterga 1978-yildagi Kemp-Devid shartnomasi; 1970-yillarning oxirlarida AQSH-Xitoy aloqalarini normallashtirish; 1979-yilda Eron garovi inqiroziga sabab bo'lgan Eron inqilobi; va 1979-yildagi Sovet Ittifoqining Afg'onistondagi bosqini kabi xalqaro masalalarni diplomatik tarzda hal qilishda yordam berdi.
mt: As an NSA employee, he helped Carter negotiate the Camp David Accords; normalize U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s; the 1979 Iranian Revolution, which led to the hostage crisis; and the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, all diplomatically.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Rayan Gosling va Emma Stoun ishtirokidagi kinofilm hamma asosiy yo'nalishlar bo'yicha nominatsiyalarni qo'lga kiritdi.
mt: 2010 film starring Rayan Gosling and Emma Stoun won all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling va Stoun mos ravishda "Eng yaxshi aktyor va aktrisa" nominatsiyalarini qo'lga kiritishdi.
mt: Gosling and Stone won the "Best Actor and Actress" nominations.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Boshqa nominatsiyalar eng yaxshi film, rejissyor, kinematografiya, kiyim dizayni, filmni montaj qilish, o'ziga xos rol, mahsulot dizayni, ovoz montaji, ovozlarni aralashtirish va o'ziga xos ssenariylarni o'z ichiga oladi.
mt: Other categories include best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, makeup and hairstyling, sound mixing, sound editing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Kinoning ikki ashulasi — "Tinglov" ("Orzu qiladigan ahmoqlar") hamda "Yulduzlar shahri" eng yaxshi original qo'shiq nominatsiyalarini qo'lga kiritdi. Lionsgate studiyasi boshqa har qanday studiyadan ko'ra ko'proq – 26 ta nominatsiyaga sazovor bo'ldi.
mt: 2 of the 3 songs nominated for best original song won: "Tears in Heaven" ("The Sleepyheads") and "A Star is Born". Lionsgate studio won the most nominations – 26.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Yakshanba oqshomida AQSH prezidenti Donald Tramp matbuot kotibi orqali bergan bayonotida AQSH qo'shinlari Suriyadan chiqib ketishini e'lon qildi.
mt: On Friday afternoon, U.S. President Donald Trump announced in a press statement that U.S. troops would be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Tramp Turkiya prezidenti Rajab Toyyib Erdo'g'an bilan telefonda gaplashganidan keyin bu haqida ma'lum qilindi.
mt: Tramp was informed by Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan after a phone call.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Bayonotda qayd etilishicha, Turkiya, shunigdek, Yevropa davlatlari yurtiga qaytarishdan bosh tortgan ISHID jangarilarini qo'riqlashni o'z zimmasiga oladi.
mt: The statement said Turkey, which has refused to repatriate IS militants, will take responsibility for guarding them.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Bu faqat allaqachon keng tarqalgan nazariya — hech bo'lmaganda ayrim dinozavrlarda tuk bo'lganini tasdiqlabgina qolmay, balki rangli va uch o'lchamli joylashuv kabi odatda qoldiqlar berolmaydigan tafsilotlarni taqdim etadi.
mt: This is only a theory — it proves not only that some dinosaurs had feathers, but also that they were colored and had three-dimensional arrangements of feathers, which are usually not preserved in fossils.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Olimlarning aytishicha, mazkur hayvonning ustki patlari kashtan-jigarrang, pastkilari esa och yoki karatenoid rangda bo'lgan.
mt: The researchers say the animal's upper feathers are chestnut-brown, and its underparts are either white or carotenoid-colored.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Topilma qushlardagi patlar evolyutsiyasi to'g'risida ham tushuncha beradi.
mt: It also sheds light on the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Dinozavrlarning patlarida raxis deb ataluvchi yaxshi shakllangan pat o'zagi mavjud bo'lmagani, biroq patlarning boshqa xususiyatlari — soqolcha va tukchalarga ega bo'lgani bois tadqiqotchilar, hoynahoy, raxis boshqa xususiyatlarga qaraganda kechroq paydo bo'lgan evolyutsion rivojlanish, degan xulosaga kelishdi.
mt: The absence of rachis, a well-developed neck vertebra, in the dinosaur's neck, but the presence of other features, such as a crest and a beak, led researchers to conclude that raxis was a later evolutionary development than other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Patlarning tuzilishi shuni ko'rsatadiki, ulardan uchish uchun emas, balki haroratni nazorat qilish yoxud ko'z-ko'z qilish maqsadida foydalanilgan. Tadqiqotchilar fikricha, bu yosh dinozavrning dumi bo'lsa ham, namuna jo'janing patini emas, balki voyaga yetganning tuklarini ko'rsatadi.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were used for thermoregulation or display, not flight. The researchers say the specimen is a juvenile, not an adult, and the feathers are more like those of an adult.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Tadqiqotchilar fikricha, garchi ushbu yosh dinozavrning dumi bo'lsa-da, namuna jo'janing patlarini emas, balki katta turning tukini ko'rsatadi.
mt: Researchers say that although this young dinosaur's tail is preserved, the specimen shows no feathers, but rather a large patch of downy fuzz.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Kecha ertalab Turkiyaning Gaziantep shahridagi politsiya shtab-kvartirasi yaqinida mashinada bomba portlatilishi natijasida ikki politsiya xodimi halok bo'ldi va yigirmadan ortiq kishi jarohatlandi.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and 20 injured when a bomb exploded in a car near the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, early this morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Gubernator idorasi jarohatlanganlarning o'n to'qqiz nafari politsiya xodimlari bo'lganini ma'lum qildi.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Politsiya Daish (ISHID) jangarisi hujum uchun javobgarlikda gumon qilinayotganini aytdi.
mt: Police said a Daish (ISIS) fighter was suspected of responsibility for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Ular Quyosh boshqa yulduzlarga o'xshagan asosiy tamoyillar asosida harakatlanganini aniqlashdi: tizimdagi barcha yulduzlar faolligi ularning yorug'ligi, aylanishidan boshqa hech narsaga bog'liq emasligi aniqlandi.
mt: They found that all stars in the cluster move in the same way, based on their brightness and rotation, independent of any other factors.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Yorug'lik va aylanish yulduzning plazma oqimi bilan bog'liq bo'lgan Rossbi raqamini aniqlash uchun birgalikda foydalaniladi.
mt: Light and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number, which is related to the plasma flow of a star.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Rossbi soni qancha kichik bo'lsa, yulduzning magnetik o'zgarishlarga nisbatan faolligi shuncha past bo'ladi.
mt: The more massive a star is, the less active its magnetic field is.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: O'z sayohati mobaynida Ivasaki ko'p vaziyatlar muammoga ro'baro' kelgan.
mt: During his trip, Iwasaki encountered many problems.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Uni qaroqchilar tunagan, unga Tibetda quturgan kuchuk hamla qilgan, Nepalda nikohdan qochib ketgan hamda Hindistonda hibsga olingan.
mt: She was kidnapped, abducted in Tibet, eloped in Nepal and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n standarti 2,4 Gs va 5,0 Gs chastotalarining ikkalasida ham ishlaydi.
mt: 802.11n standard works on both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Agar tayanch stansiyada qo'sh radio bo'lsa, bu uning 802.11a, 802.11b va 802.11g bilan orqaga qarab mos kelishiga imkon beradi.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all backwards compatible with this base station.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n tezligi eng yuqori nazariy ishlab chiqarish quvvati 600 Mbit/s bo'lgan o'zining avvalgi avlodlaridan ko'ra ancha tezroq.
mt: 802.11n has a theoretical maximum production capacity of 600 Mbit/s, faster than its predecessors.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Oilali, ikki nafar voyaga yetgan farzandi bor Duvall voqeaga aloqador bo'lgan Millerda katta taassurot qoldirmagan.
mt: The 29-year-old father of two, Duvall, was not involved in the incident.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Izoh so'ralganida Miller shunday dedi: "Mayk tinglov paytida ko'p gapiradi… Men tayyorlanayotgandim, shu sababli u nima deyotganini unchalik eshitmayotgandik".
mt: When asked about Miller, he said, "Mike talks a lot while listening… I was getting ready, so I wasn't really listening to what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Biz 2020-yilgacha YaIM birligiga to'g'ri keluvchi karbonat angidrid chiqindilarini 2005-yildagiga qaraganda sezilarli darajada kamaytirishga harakat qilamiz", dedi Hu.
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions by 2005 levels by 2020, which is consistent with the Paris Agreement," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: U kamaytirishlar bo'yicha biror raqamni keltirmadi, ularning Xitoy iqtisodiyoti natijalari asosida amalga oshirilishini aytdi.
mt: He did not mention any specific number, saying that the results were based on China's economy.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarni "dastlab ifloslantirish, keyinroq tozalashdan iborat eski usuldan voz kechish"ga chaqirdi.
mt: He urged developing countries to "stop polluting first, then clean up later" from the old way.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: U "biroq, ulardan imkoniyatlari, javobgarligi, rivojlanish bosqichidan tashqari bo'lgan majburiyatlarni zimmasiga olish so'ralmasligi kerak", — deya qo'shimcha qildi.
mt: "However, they should not be asked to take on responsibilities, accountabilities and developmental stages beyond their capabilities," he added.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Iroqni o'rganish guruhi bugun soat 12:00 GMT da o'z hisobotini taqdim etdi.
mt: The Iraq Study Group is due to release its report at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Bu mazkur holatda Iroqdagi hech bir harakat mazhablararo qurolli kurashni, oshib borayotgan zo'ravonlikni yoxud tartibsizlik sari siljishni to'xtatishga hech kim kafolat bermasligidan ogohlantiradi.
mt: This statement warns that no one can guarantee to stop the ongoing violence, chaos and disorder caused by the ongoing sectarian conflict in Iraq.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Hisobot Yaqin Sharqqa nisbatan siyosat haqida AQSHda umumiy kelishuvni shakllantirish hamda ochiq muhokama uchun da'vo bilan ochiladi.
mt: The report is about a policy towards the Middle East and the creation of a general consensus in the United States and open debate.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Hisobot Iroqqa nisbatan Ijroiya siyosatining deyarli har bir jihatini qattiq tanqid ostiga oladi va zudlik bilan yo'nalishni o'zgartirishga undaydi.
mt: The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the Iraq policy and urges a swift change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Uning 78 tavsiyasidan birinchisi shuki, shu yil oxiriga qadar Iroq chegaralarini tajovuzlardan himoya qilish va qo'shnilar bilan diplomatik aloqalarni qayta tiklashga oid yangi diplomatik choralarni boshlash lozim.
mt: 1 of his 78 recommendations is to reestablish diplomatic relations with neighbors and to reestablish new diplomatic measures to protect Iraq's borders from attacks by the end of this year.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Kecha kechqurun Buenos-Ayresdan 50 km (31 mil) uzoqlikdagi La Platada amaldagi senator va Argentinaning birinchi xonimi Kristina Fernandes de Kirshner prezidentlikka o'z nomzodini qo'yishini ma'lum qildi.
mt: 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, former senator and Argentina's first lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president late last night.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Kirchner xonim Argentina teatrida prezidentlikka nomzodini qo'yishni niyat qilganini e'lon qildi, xuddi shu joyda u 2005-yili Buenos-Ayres provinsiyasi delegatsiyasi a'zosi sifatida Senat uchun o'z kampaniyasini boshlagandi.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president in the theater where she began her campaign for the Senate in 2005 as a delegate from Buenos Aires province.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Mazkur munozaralar Katrina to'fonidan keyingi yordam hamda qayta tiklash xarajatlari bo'yicha tortishuvlarga sabab bo'ldi; buni ba'zi moliyaviy konservatorlar buni hazilomuz tarzda "Bushning Nyu-Orlean kelishuvi" deb atashdi.
mt: This controversy was over post-Katrina relief and rebuilding costs; some fiscal conservatives derisively called it "Bush's New Orleans deal".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Qayta qurish sa'y-harakatlarini erkin tanqid qilish Vashington ichidagi shaxslarga qayta qurish bitimlarini taqdim qilishga qaratilgan.
mt: Free criticism of reconstruction efforts is directed at individuals who present reconstruction contracts in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Dafn marosimida ishtirok etish uchun to'rt milliondan ko'proq kishi Rimga tashrif buyurdi.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Kelganlar soni shu qadar ko'p ediki, barchaning Avliyo Peter maydonidagi dafn marosimiga kirishi imkonsiz edi.
mt: So many people came that it was impossible for everyone to attend the funeral procession on St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Odamlarga marosimni ko'rishlariga imkon berish uchun Rimning turli joylarida bir nechta katta ekranli televizorlar o'rnatilgan edi.
mt: To allow people to watch the ceremony, large screens were set up in various places in Rome.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Italiyadagi boshqa ko'pgina shaharlarda hamda dunyoning qolgan qismida, xususan, Polshada ko'p sonli kishilar tomonidan tomosha qilingan shunga o'xshash konstruksiyalar o'rnatildi.
mt: Similar structures have been erected in other Italian cities as well as in other parts of the world, notably in Poland, where they have been viewed by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Tarixchilar agentlikning muvaffaqiyat darajasini kuchaytirish uchun osongina hal qilish mumkin bo'lgan, ayniqsa avtomobil o'g'rilanishi bo'yicha ishlarga resurslarning qaratilganligi uchun FQB agentligining o'tmishdagi siyosatlarini tanqid qildilar.
mt: Historians criticized the agency's past policies for focusing resources on easily solved issues, especially those involving car accidents.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongress 2005-moliyaviy yildan axloqsizlik bo'yicha tashabbusni moliyalashtira boshladi va FQB kattalar pornografiyasiga 10 nafar agent ajratishi lozimligini belgiladi.
mt: 2005 Congress began funding a bill to combat pornography and allocated $10 million to the FBI to combat adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Utappa 11 ta to'rtlik va 2 ta oltilikni urgan holda atigi 41 ta to'pda 70 ta ranlardan iborat to'p uzatishlarda eng yuqori balni qayd etdi.
mt: 11 fours and 2 sixes, Robin Utappa scored 70 runs off 41 balls in a 70-ball over.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: o'rta zveno betsmenlari Sachin Tendulkar va Rahul Dravid yaxshi o'yin ko'rsatdi va birgalikda yuz ran to'plagan sheriklarga aylandi.
mt: Middle order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid played well and became partners in crime, scoring 100 runs together.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Biroq sardor viketini yo'qotganidan keyin, Hindiston uzatmalarni yakunlash uchun 7 ta viket yo'qotishlar bilan faqatgina 36 ta ranni amalga oshirdi.
mt: However, after losing the captain's wicket, India went on to lose 7 wickets for 36 runs.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: AQSH Prezidenti Jorj V. Bush, Osiyo bo'ylab bir haftalik sayohatini boshlab, 16-noyabr kuni tongda Singapurga yetib keldi.
mt: 16 November 2006: US President George W. Bush began a week-long tour of Asia, arriving in Singapore early this morning.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: U Singapur Bosh vazirining muovini Vong Kan Seng tomonidan kutib olindi hamda Singapur Bosh Vaziri Li Syan Lun bilan savdo-sotiq va terrorizm masalalarini muhokama qildi.
mt: He was received by Singapore's Prime Minister's Special Envoy Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Oraliq saylovlardagi bir haftalik yo'qotishlardan keyin, Bush ommaga Osiyoda savdo-sotiqning kengayishi to'g'risida so'zlab berdi.
mt: 7 days after the midterm elections, Bush spoke to the public about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Bosh vazir Stiven Xarper hukumatning "Toza havo haqidagi qonuni"ni uning ikkinchi o'qilishidan avval seshanba kuni NDP yetakchisi Jek Leyton bilan PMOdagi 25 daqiqalik uchrashuvdan keyin barcha partiyalar qo'mitasiga ko'rib chiqish uchun jo'natishga rozilik bildirdi.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper sent the "Clean Air Act" to all-party committee for review after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton on Monday, the day before its second reading.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Bosh vazir bilan uchrashuv paytida Layton konservatorlarning atrof-muhit haqidagi qonun loyihasini "batafsil va to'liq qayta yozish"ni, Konservatorlar partiyasining atrof-muhit haqidagi qonun loyihasiga o'zgartishlar kiritishni so'radi.
mt: Layton asked the Prime Minister to "re-write in detail and in full" the Conservative Party's environment bill, which would amend the party's environment bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Federal hukumat Tasmaniyaning Devonport shahrida joylashgan Mersey shifoxonasini moliyalashtirishni o'z zimmasiga olishga kirishganidan beri, mamlakat hukumati va ba'zi federal parlament a'zolari ushbu harakatni Noyabr oyiga belgilangan federal saylovlar oldidan hiyla deb tanqid qildi.
mt: The federal government has taken over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania since the state government and some federal parliamentarians have criticized the move as a stunt before the November federal elections.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Lekin Bosh vazir Jon Xovardning so'zlariga ko'ra, bu chora faqat qo'shimcha 45 million AUD ajratish orqali Tasmaniya hukumati tomonidan shifoxona reytigini pasaytirishdan himoya qilishga qaratilgan.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the move was only to protect the hospital's ranking from a further 45 million AUD cut by the Tasmanian government.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: So'ngi byulletenga ko'ra, dengiz sathi ko'rsatkichlari sunami vujudga kelganiga ishora qildi. Pago Pago va Niue yaqinida shubhasiz sunami harakati qayd etilgan.
mt: The latest bulletin reports that sea level gauges indicate a tsunami has been generated.  A definite tsunami has been observed in the vicinity of Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tongada katta zarar yoki jarohatlar qayd qilinmagan, lekin elektr energiyasi vaqtincha uzilgan va bu Tonga hukumatiga PTWC tomonidan berilgan sunami ogohlantirishini qabul qilishga xalal bergani xabar qilinmoqda.
mt: There were no reports of major damage or injuries, but power was temporarily cut and Tonga's government was said to be receiving a tsunami warning from the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Gavayidagi sohil bo'yi yoxud uning yaqinida joylashgan o'n to'rt maktabning barchasi ogohlantirishlar bekor qilinganligiga qaramasdan, chorshanba kuni yopildi.
mt: 14 schools along the coast or nearby were closed despite the cancellation of warnings.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: AQSH prezidenti Jorj V. Bush bu xabarni mamnuniyat ila qabul qildi.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the news.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bushning matbuot kotibi Gordon Jondro Shimoliy Koreya va'dasi to'g'risida quyidagicha fikr bildirdi: "Koreya yarim orolining yadrosizlantirilishini tekshirilishiga erishish yo'lidagi yirik qadam".
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said of the North Korean pledge: "A major step toward the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Bugun Atlantika ummonida Atlantika dovullar mavsumining o'ninchi dovuli bo'lgan Jerri subtropik dovuli hosil bo'ldi.
mt: Today, the Atlantic Ocean, the Atlantic hurricane season's tenth named storm, Jerry, became a subtropical storm.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Dovullardan ogohlantirish milliy markazi (NHC) ayni damda Jerri quruqlikka biror xavf tug'dirmasligini ta'kidlamoqda.
mt: The National Hurricane Center is also reminding people that Jerry is not a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: AQSH muhandislar korpusi 6 duymli yog'ingarchilik oldin zararlangan to'g'onlarni buzishi mumkin deya taxmin qildi.
mt: 6 inches of rain is expected to cause damage to levees, according to the U.S. Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Katrina bo'roni vaqtida 20 fut balandlikdagi toshqinga guvoh bo'lgan to'qqizinchi bo'linma, suv yaqindagi to'g'ondan oshib o'tgani sababli, hozirda belgacha keladigan suv ostida qolgan.
mt: 20 feet high boulder witnessed by the 19th squadron, which was washed away by a nearby dam, is now underwater.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Suv damba ustudan 100 fut kenglikdagi bo'limdan toshib ketmoqda.
mt: 100-foot-wide section of the dam is collapsing.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Parlamentning quyi palatasi ma'muri Adam Kuerden o'tgan oyda Wikinews bilan suhbatida o'chirishlardan ranjiganini aytdi.
mt: The Speaker of the House of Commons Adam Kuerden told Wikinews last month that he was injured in the riots.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "U [Uels] boshidanoq bizga yolg'on gapirgan. Birinchidan, buning huquqiy sabablar tufayli bo'lganligi kabi harakat qilish orqali. Ikkinchidan, to o'zining mohirona yo'qolishigacha o'zini bizni tinglayotgandek qilib ko'rsatish orqali".
mt: "He [Wales] lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if there were legal reasons for it. Second, by pretending to listen to us until he disappeared in his own way."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Jamiyat g'azablanishi millionlab ochiq litsenziyali media joylashtirilgan sayt uchun jinsiy kontentga oid siyosat loyihasini tayyorlash bo'yicha joriy harakatlarga olib keldi.
mt: The community outrage over the proposal to draft a policy for sexual content on a site with millions of open-licensed media was the result of current actions.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Bajarilgan ishlarning aksariyati nazariy edi, biroq dastur o'qotar galaktikasidagi kuzatuvlarni simulyatsiya qilish uchun yozilgan edi.
mt: Most of the work was theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations of a spiral galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Jamoa qidirgan effektga galaktikaning qorong'i materiyasi va Somon yo'lining qorong'i materiyasi o'rtasidagi to'lqin kuchlari sabab bo'ladi.
mt: The team believes the effect is caused by the gravitational waves between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Sombrero's dust lane.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Xuddi oy to'lqinlarni yuzaga keltirgan holda yerga tortish kuchi bilan ta'sir ko'rsatgani kabi Somon yo'li ham Qavs galaktikasiga kuch bilan ta'sir qiladi.
mt: The Somon Way also exerts a gravitational pull on the Galaxy similar to the way the tides are caused by the pull of the moon.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Olimlar qora materiya boshqa qora materiyaga xuddi odatiy materiya ta'sir qilgani kabi ta'sir ko'rsatadi, degan xulosaga kelishdi.
mt: Researchers found that black matter behaves like ordinary matter when interacting with other black matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Mazkur nazariyaga ko'ra, galaktika atrofidagi qora materiyaning aksariyati galaktika atrofida chambar shaklida joylashgan va juda ko'p mayda zarralardan tashkil topgan.
mt: According to this theory, most of the dark matter in the galaxy is distributed in a ring around the galaxy and consists of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Televizion xabarlarda zavoddan chiqayotgan oq tutun tasvirlangan.
mt: Television footage showed smoke billowing from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Mahalliy hokimiyat organlari zavod atrofidagi aholini uyda qolish, konditsionerlarni o'chirib qo'yish hamda jo'mraklardan suv ichmaslik to'g'risida ogohlantirmoqda.
mt: Local authorities are advising residents near the factory to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and refrain from drinking water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Zavodda radioaktiv seziy va yod aniqlangani haqida Yaponiya yadroviy agentligi xabar bergan.
mt: The Japanese nuclear agency reported that radioactive iodine and cesium were found at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Mutasaddilar organlari joydagi uran yoqilg'isi bo'lgan konteynerlar yorilgan va to'kilayotgan bo'lishi mumkinligini taxmin qilishmoqda.
mt: Authorities are concerned that containers of uranium fuel may have been damaged and leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Janubiy Afrikaning KvaZulu-Natal viloyatida shifokor Toni Moll dori vositasiga o'ta bardoshli sil kasalligini (XDR-TB) aniqladi.
mt: A doctor in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province, Tony Moll, identified a patient with extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB).
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Intervyuda u yangi tur "juda yuqori o'lim darajasi tufayli juda xavotirli va qo'rqinchli bo'lganligini" aytdi.
mt: In an interview, he said the new type was "very dangerous and frightening because of its very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Doktor Mollning fikriga ko'ra, bir nechta bemorlar shifoxonada kasallikni yuqtirgan bo'lishlari mumkin va eng kamida ulardan ikkitasi shifoxonadagi sog'liqni saqlash xodimlari bo'lgan.
mt: Dr. Moll believes that several patients may have contracted the illness at the hospital and at least two of them were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
